GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is chosen when customers ask about the cost of their contract or renewal.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the query is about the cost of a contract, provide the accurate cost details.
If the customer requires further clarification, ensure the cost details are clearly explained.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only provide accurate cost information related to the customer's contract. You cannot provide estimates for unrelated services.
